BM_VALUE=255
RPE_VALUE=64
ILM_VALUE=127
AUTO_ILM_BF_ENFACE=9,5,5
AUTO_ILM_BF_BSCAN=7,5,5
AUTO_RPE_BF_ENFACE=9,5,5
AUTO_RPE_BF_BSCAN=7,5,5
MAN_ILM_BF_BSCAN=5,3,3
MAN_RPE_BF_BSCAN=7,5,5
MAN_ILM_MEDIAN=11
MAN_RPE_MEDIAN=9
MAN_BM_MEDIAN=31
MAN_ILM_THICKNESS=3
MAN_RPE_THICKNESS=5
MAN_BM_THICKNESS=2
REF_RPE_BF_ENFACE=5,2,2
REF_RPE_BF_BSCAN=5,2,2
SMALLWINDOW=False
